question: Which are the only two nations involved in the "San Juan River Border Dispute"?
explanation: Costa Rica and Nicaragua are the only two nations involved in the San Juan River Border Dispute. This dispute arises in the interpretation of the delimitation and navigation rights of the San Juan River, as per the Canas-Jerez Treaty of 1858. The 2010 dispute regarding the dredging of San Juan River was called by the media as Google Maps War.
